transcript:
Customer: Mangal Bhavan
Hello
Executive: Hello
Good afternoon sir, Sandhya baat kar rahi thi IndiaMART office se senior manager.
Customer: Boliye.
Executive: Actually aapka na concern raise hua tha IndiaMART pe abhi aapka call aaya hua tha.
Customer: Ha ji.
Executive: To aap batayenge sir kya problem aa rahi hai aapko?
Customer: Wo jab maine IndiaMART ka subscription liya tha.
Executive: Ha ji.
Customer: Tab mujhe sath mein bola gaya tha ek vyapar aur ek dusra koi naam bola gaya tha.
Executive: Live keeping bola hoga, live keeping.
Customer: Ha uska che mahine ka subscription free of milega.
Executive: Thik hai.
Customer: Ha uske regarding koi message nahi mila hai.
Executive: Achcha aapke paas koi message nahi aaya hai?
Customer: Nahi abhi tak nahi aaj mahina ho gaya.
Executive: Ek second aap line pe raho, main ek baar check kar leti hu. Aur abhi manager hamare kaun hai ye Aman ji.
Executive: Aman Sahu hai ha ha ha.
Customer: Ha unse baat hua to wo bolte mere ko iske regarding koi jankari nahi hai.
Executive: Rukiye main abhi check karti hu. Usne mere ko do din ka time manga hai.
Executive: Rukiye rukiye sir main abhi aapka ye solve kara deti hu. Ek second.
Executive: Aapne koi bhi ek cheez aap le sakte ho na ya to aap live keeping le sakte ho ya fir aap vyapar app le sakte ho. To aapko kya lena hai sir aap wo bataiye.
Customer: Chalo uska koi mere ko information milega detail milega to main bata sakta hu madam kaun sa mere liye faydemand rahega.
Executive: Ah aap ek second line pe raho sir main aapko. Mere ko aap ek kaam kijiye aisa ho to whatsapp mein thoda detail dal dijiye na.
Executive: Whatsapp mein main aapko details wagera sab dal deti hu ki live keeping mein aapko kya benefit milte hain aur aapko usme kya benefit milte hain.
Customer: Uske hisab se liya jaye na samajh gaya madam.
Executive: Ha aur aapke paas na matlab whatsapp pe bhi aayega thik hai.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: To whatsapp pe hi aap usko select karoge ki aapko live keeping app chahiye ya fir aapko wo chahiye. To main team ko.
Customer: Thik hai whatsapp pe kar lenge.
Executive: Ha main team ko ek baar share kar deti hu.
Customer: Thik hai madam.
Executive: Thik hai iske alawa aapka koi aur concern hai sir?
Customer: Nahi abhi koi problem nahi hai.
Executive: Thik hai to main aapse ek cheez bol rahi hu sir main abhi aapko apna direct number share kar rahi hu thik hai.
Customer: Ha ji ha.
Executive: Aur ye wala jo aapne matlab call kara hai IndiaMART customer care pe thik hai. Ha.
Executive: Ye main aapka concern close kar du?
Customer: Okay kar dijiye. Thik hai aapke paas iska solution mil jayega na mere ko.
Executive: Definitely sir abhi just main aapka mail hi initiate kar deti hu team aapko connect kar legi ya to aap live keeping le lena ya fir aap apna wo le lena kya bolte hain.
Customer: Thik hai baki.
Customer: Okay okay.
Executive: Na uske liye bhi aapke paas call ya mail aa jayega team se aapko whatsapp pe connect karenge what ke through hi aap sara cheeze kar lijiyega. Thik hai madam.
Executive: Aur aapko wo demo bhi denge live keeping ka bhi denge and aapko vyapar app ka bhi demo denge jo aapko thik lagta hai wo select karke aap aage process kar lena. Thik hai.
Executive: But sir aapko 30 days ho gaye aapne kyu matlab itna delay kara is cheez mein?
Customer: Delay usme sir mere ko fir aaj yaad aa gaya ki ye log kuch free mein bol rahe the che mahine ka subscription ke naam pe fir bhula gaya beech mein beech mein thoda time bhi nahi tha sab position sath mein tha. Diwali ka chutti aa gaya tha 12 din ka.
Executive: Ha ha ha ha ha samajh gaye samajh gaye.
Customer: Isliye sab rah gaya.
Executive: Thik hai no problem sir to hum isme aapko ek baar resolve karwa dete hain aapko kya kya benefit mil sakta hai. Okay madam.
Executive: Thik hai same number aap whatsapp pe rahega?
Customer: Ha ji 8200673436.
Executive: Thik hai main abhi aapko whatsapp bataiye ek baar number whatsapp wala.
Customer: 8200
Executive: Ek second 8200
Customer: 67
Executive: Ha.
Customer: 3436
Executive: 3436 ha.
Customer: Dekhiye maine aapko whatsapp bhi kar diya hai.
Executive: Okay madam dekh leta hu. Thik hai aap dekh lijiye aur jo bhi main abhi mail initiate karungi aapko us mail id mein aapko bhi rakh lete hain aur aapko ye solve kara deti hu IndiaMART se business kaisa chal raha hai aapka?
Customer: Business abhi to usme aisa hai nahi humne hai thoda dekhte hain ek do mahina do mahina baad mein malum chalega. Conversion wagera hua sir matlab ek aad deal aapki convert hui hai abhi tak?
Customer: Ha ek do deal ho gaya hai aisa nahi nahi hua. Ha wahi cheez na aur aap bulk order quantity mein deal karte ho right?
Customer: Nahi bulk mein to abhi nahi mila hai. Ha.
Customer: Sir pe to bulk mein par uska humne fir divide karke chota catalog kar diya hai.
Executive: To aap jo deal karte ho wo batik printed cotton sarees midnight blue hand block printed sarees mein deal karte ho aap sir.
Customer: Karte usi mein par humko kya minimum order quantity 100 piece ka chahiye.
Executive: Achcha to aapka kuch manufacturing unit hai?
Customer: Kya madam?
Executive: Aap khud manufacture karte ho sarees wagera?
Customer: Ha ji hum khud manufacturer hai hamara unit hai khud ka. Achcha achcha achcha thik hai thik hai no problem. To main ek baar aap thoda divide karke 20 piece ka 25 piece ka aisa karke kar diya fir do teen deal mila hai.
Executive: Achcha. Hmm.
Executive: To matlab matlab minimum aapka 100 pieces ka requirement rahega agar aap deal karte ho to 100 pieces ka requirement rahega aapka.
Customer: Ha ji hmm. Thik hai no problem main ek baar check karwa leti hu aapki team se by list ka bhi dekhwa leti hu aur ek baar aapko video meeting se aap aa sakte ho kya to hum ek baar discussion kar lete hain.
Customer: To aap kal ka time lijiye to kuch ho sakta hai aaj to. Kal aapko kis time pe call karna hai aap bataiye.
Customer: 10 baje se aap kab aapka office kab open hota hai? 6 baje tak rehta hai sir sham ko. Sabere kitna baje hota hai? 9 baje se.
Customer: Ha to 9 se 11 11:30 baje tak beech mein kabhi bhi.
Executive: Thik hai. Okay madam.
Executive: Thik hai main aapka concern close kar rahi hu aur aapka call aage initiate deti hu aur aap isko wo karwa dijiyega thik hai aapke paas ek feedback mail jayega agar aap satisfied hai to aap yes kar dijiyega. Okay madam.
Executive: Thik hai sir okay.
Executive: Thank you so much.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not received free 6-month subscription message.

- Manager had no information regarding subscription.



Resolution:

- Executive offered live keeping or Vyapar app.

- Agreed to send details on WhatsApp.

- Will initiate a mail and team will connect.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will receive a call or mail from team.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, free, vyapar app, live keeping
